extractedData.name: Maria Antoniraj
extractedData.title: Senior Dotnet Developer
extractedData.location: Al Karama, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
extractedData.summary: 8.6 Years of experience in the Requirements Gathering, analysis, design, and development of web applications and database design, Deployment and supporting using Microsoft Technologies. I am having good exposure on different domain like Insurance, Finance, Mutual Fund, Commercial, HRMS, and Healthcare projects for leading provider organizations. Good in Microsoft Visual Studio IDE using ASP.NET, C#, MVC 5.0, .Net Core, Web API, WCF, ORM (ADO, EF), Microservices, SQL, PL/SQL, OOPS, SOLID Principle, Design Pattern, AJAX, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Azure, git, LINQ, Angular. I hold a good knowledge of all the phases of software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and possesses exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills and a good team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills. I have completed my Bachelor of Computer Science and Master of Computer Application from India.
